entries.name: ALL_CROSSREF_REGEXP
entries.desc:
Version of CROSSREF_REGEXP used when
--hyperlink-all is specified.

entries.name: CLASS_REGEXP_STR
entries.desc:
Regular expression to match class references

There can be a '\' in front of text to suppress the cross-reference

There can be a '::' in front of class names to reference from the
top-level namespace.

The method can be followed by parenthesis (not recommended)

entries.name: CROSSREF_REGEXP
entries.desc:
Regular expressions matching text that should potentially have
cross-reference links generated are passed to add_regexp_handling. Note
that these expressions are meant to pick up text for which cross-references
have been suppressed, since the suppression characters are removed by the
code that is triggered.

entries.name: METHOD_REGEXP_STR
entries.desc:
Regular expression to match method references.
See CLASS_REGEXP_STR

entries.name: seen
entries.desc: Hash of references that have been looked-up to their replacements

entries.name: new(context)
entries.desc: Allows cross-references to be created based on the given context (RDoc::Context).
